title: 725: BITCOIN HITS $60K AFTER REPORTS OF IMMINENT ETF APPROVAL!! BTC WILL SURGE 10X, PREDICTS CATHIE WOOD!
description:
Bitcoin has surpassed the $60,000 mark briefly for the first time since April 2021. The BTC price has been boosted by reports suggesting a Bitcoin futures ETF is likely to begin trading in the United States as early as next week.

In a tweet on Oct. 15, the analyst stated: “Pretty much done deal. Expect launches next week,” before adding the “odds now over 90% IMO.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
